mapper.insert: merge upms_permission as t using (select *, (select max(orders) from upms_permission where pid = temp.pid and name != N'系统管理') as orders from (select #{obj.id} as id, '40288fcb722b7518017234e294cb0000' as system_id, #{obj.pid} as pid, #{obj.name} as name, #{obj.type} as type, #{obj.permissionValue} as permission_value, #{obj.uri} as uri, #{obj.ctime} as ctime ) as temp) s on s.name = t.name and s.pid = t.pid when not matched then insert (id, system_id, pid, name, type, uri , permission_value, orders, status, ctime) values (s.id, s.system_id, isnull(s.pid, '1'), s.name, s.type, s.uri, s.permission_value, isnull(s.orders, 100) + 100, 1, s.ctime);
mapper.select: select id from upms_permission where name = #{obj.name} and pid = #{obj.pid}
